mapper.insert: insert into myfile (id, fname, url, cdate, fsize, ftype, funid) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ftype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update myfile set fname = #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cdate = #{cdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fsize = #{fsize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ftype = #{ftype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, funid = #{funid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select m.id, m.fname, m.url, m.cdate, m.fsize, m.ftype, f.name from myfile m left join functionary f on f.Job_id=m.funid
